Package org.apache.drill.exec.store.easy.text.reader

Version 3 of the text reader.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseFieldOutput  
    CompliantTextBatchReader
    New text reader, complies with the RFC 4180 standard for text/csv files
    HeaderBuilder
    Text output that implements a header reader/parser.
    RepeatedVarCharOutput
    Class is responsible for generating record batches for text file inputs.
    TextParsingSettings  
    TextReader
    A byte-based Text parser implementation.

Package org.apache.drill.exec.store.easy.text.reader Description

Version 3 of the text reader. Hosts the "compliant" text reader on the row set framework.
